object.name: artwork
object.property:
<model xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema">
    <schema>
      <field name="image" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage">
        <description/>
        <title>Image</title>
      </field>
      <field name="artist" type="zope.schema.TextLine" indexer:searchable="true">
        <description>Artist is separately indexed.</description>
        <required>False</required>
        <title>Artist</title>
      </field>
      <field name="text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText" indexer:searchable="true">
        <default><table>
  <tbody>
  <tr>
  <td align="right">Artist</td>
  <td></td>
  <td align="left">xxx</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td align="right">Title</td>
  <td> </td>
  <td>xxx</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td align="right">Date</td>
  <td>  </td>
  <td>xxx</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td align="right">Medium</td>
  <td> </td>
  <td>xxx</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td align="right">Photo Source</td>
  <td> </td>
  <td>xxx</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
  <td align="right">Item</td>
  <td></td>
  <td>xxx</td>
  </tr>
  </tbody>
  </table></default>
        <description>Notes are searchable, but not separately indexed.</description>
        <required>False</required>
        <title>Notes</title>
      </field>
    </schema>
  </model>
